mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (first_name, last_name, hire_date, salary, credential_id) VALUES (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{hireDate}, #{salary}, #{credentials.id})
mapper.select: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.hire_date, e.salary, e.credential_id, c.id as 'credential_id', c.login as 'credentials.login', c.password as 'credentials.password' FROM employees e LEFT JOIN credentials c ON e.credential_id = c.id WHERE e.id = #{id}
